asistencia.asistenciaInfo: It is recommended to have the following information at hand before requesting a roadside assistance service:
asistencia.asistenciaTel: In the event that you require Roadside Assistance within the United States of America you should call:
asistencia.asistenciaServiciosDesc: Here you can consult the road assistance services that we offer.
asistencia.asistenciaImportanteDesc: All coverage up to a maximum of $100.00 dollars, granting 1 service in policies from 1 to 179 days and 2 services in semi-annual and annual policies.
asistencia.asistenciaImportanteSpan: Exclusive service within the United States.

accidente.accidenteDescOne: In the United States and Canada, it is mandatory to have unlimited liability insurance coverage for all vehicles traveling on their roads.
accidente.accidenteDescTwo: If we are involved in an accident in the USA, there are a series of steps that we must follow to report the accident:
accidente.accidenteImportanteDesc: The adjuster in the United States does not go to the place of the accident. Everything is reported via telephone, depending on the seriousness and type of loss, the company will determine the procedure to follow. In the event that our policyholders receive a claim or lawsuit, they should notify their insurance agent or National Unity Insurance Company of any demand, subpoena or information they know of. Remember that your policy only covers cars and pick-ups for private use NOT intended for transportation and with Mexican and/or border license plates.
accidente.accidentePasos: Steps to follow to report a loss in the USA:
accidente.accidentePasosOne: Notify the police of the accident by calling 911.
accidente.accidentePasosTwo: Obtain the essential data of the driver concerned:
accidente.accidentePasosThree: Report the accident through our online form or by calling the following telephone numbers:
accidente.accidentePasosFour: Take pictures of the accident. Everything relevant for proper documentation.
accidente.accidenteImportanteFooter: Remember to keep the following information in hand in order to correctly report any loss:
accidente.accidenteImportanteFooter1: Name of the insured and the affected driver
accidente.accidenteImportanteFooter3: Contact number in Mexico and the United States
accidente.accidenteImportanteFooter4: Place and time of the accident

moto.motoDesc: Coverage for non-resident private motorcycles, designed to cover liability for damages caused to third parties in property and persons while circulating in the United States of America.

premium.premiumItems: The perfect complement for those who already have a primary coverage tourist policy.
